installation.title: Get Started with Remix PWA
installation.description: Remix PWA is a compiler that bundles your service workers as well as provide utilities and modules to build your application.

default-fetch-handler.title: defaultFetchHandler
default-fetch-handler.description: Default handler for fetching requests in the worker. Fallback for all request not handled by route worker APIs.

live-reload.title: LiveReload
live-reload.description: Remix PWA LiveReload Component. Provide HMR and reloading support to the worker thread in Remix PWA.

background-sync.title: Background Sync
background-sync.description: Background Sync allows you to defer actions until the user has stable connectivity. This is useful for ensuring that whatever the user wants to send, is actually sent.

remix-pwa-dev-cli.title: @remix-pwa/dev (CLI)
remix-pwa-dev-cli.description: Remix PWA CLI comes with the @remix-pwa/dev package. It also ships with the compiler, as well as templates for creating new Remix PWA projects. Let's explore the CLI in this section.

browser-support.title: Browser Support
browser-support.description: Not all browsers are created equal. A quick rundown of what you should be on the lookout for when developing.

upgrade-guide.title: Upgrade Guide
upgrade-guide.description: Learn how to upgrade to your Remix PWA App to v3.0

error-handler.title: errorHandler
error-handler.description: Error Handling in Remix PWA. Catch, handle and diagnose errors that occur in your service worker.

use-sw-effect.title: useSWEffect
use-sw-effect.description: useSWEffect is a React hook exported from the @remix-pwa/sw package that updates the Service Worker with changes in the main thread.

defer.title: defer
defer.description: A utility or creating a streaming/deferred response.

remix-pwa-runtime.title: @remix-pwa/{runtime}
remix-pwa-runtime.description: Runtimes are the underlying Service Worker logic that Remix PWA uses to handle fetching, routing, caching, and more. This page contains all the official runtimes and community runtimes.

caching-strategies.title: Caching Strategies
caching-strategies.description: Cache according to how you want it. Introducing strategies for more granular control over your caching process.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Learn how you can contribute to the Remix PWA Ecosystem. Thanks in advance for your help!

get-load-context.title: getLoadContext
get-load-context.description: Global context object for the worker thread. Share data globally between your workers in your routes and your service worker.

json.title: json
json.description: A utility to create application/json responses

client-utilities.title: Client Utilities
client-utilities.description: Remix PWA library of client utilities to spice up your PWA native experience. APIs to add that cherry-on-top feel to your PWA.

community.title: Community
community.description: Communities are the heart of the open source movement. Find out how you can get involved with Remix community and join in on the action.

worker-action.title: workerAction
worker-action.description: Worker-only handlers for non-GET requests. Intercept and handle requests meant for the action easily in the worker thread.

logger.title: logger
logger.description: A custom, enhanced logger for Remix PWA. Enables beautiful logging in the browser console in only development environments.

gotchas.title: Gotchas
gotchas.description: A list of what-not-to-do's and gotchas ðŸ˜œ in Remix PWA. Safety first!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about Remix PWA.

worker-loader.title: workerLoader
worker-loader.description: Worker route API for handling GET requests in the worker thread. Bring the power of Service Workers directly to your Remix routes.

redirect.title: redirect
redirect.description: A utility to assist with sending 30x responses. Useful for redirects in the browser.

precaching.title: Precaching
precaching.description: Caching before you need it. Explore precaching and learn how to cache before your users even know they need it.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Extra resources to help you get started with Remix PWA and PWAs in general.

remix-config-js.title: Configuring with remix.config.js
remix-config-js.description: Remix configuration file just got a new addition! Read about the hijack and how to upgrade your config file.

type-script.title: TypeScript Support
type-script.description: Typescript and Remix PWA. A match made in heaven. Check out our thoughts on TypeScript and our support for it in Remix PWA.

technical-explanantion.title: Technical Explanantion
technical-explanantion.description: An technical explanantion of Remix PWA v3.0 internals. This is for you if you love to know how things work under the hood.

remix-cache.title: RemixCache
remix-cache.description: A wrapper for the browser's Cache API. Use this to cache data in the browser with more control and less-hassle.

versioning.title: Versioning in Remix PWA
versioning.description: A short exceprt on how versioning work in Remix PWA

packages.title: Packages
packages.description: An overview of all the new packages that ships with Remix PWA v3.0
